metadata.title: CVE-2024-27034 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:compress: fix to cover normal cluster write with cp_rwsem When we overwritecompressed cluster w/ normal cluster, we should not unlock cp_rwsem duringf2fs_write_raw_pages(), otherwise data will be corrupted if partial blockswere persisted before CP & SPOR, due to cluster metadata wasn't updatedatomically.
